title: Resident Evil's "Final Chapter" Goes Into Production
content:
LOS ANGELES 

Titled "Resident Evil: The Final Chapter," this will be the final installment in the astoundingly successful film franchise adaptation of Capcom's hugely popular video game series, having grossed over $1 billion 

Constantin Film will produce Resident Evil: The Final Chapter. Director, Paul W.S. Anderson 

Milla Jovovich 

Picking up immediately after the events in Resident Evil: Retribution, humanity is on its last legs after Alice is betrayed by Wesker in Washington D.C. 

In a race against time Alice will join forces with old friends, and an unlikely ally, in an action packed battle with undead hordes and new mutant monsters. Between losing her superhuman abilities and Umbrella's impending attack, this will be Alice's most difficult adventure as she fights to save humanity, which is on the brink of oblivion. "Resident Evil: The Final Chapter" is produced by Jeremy Bolt Resident Evil: The Final Chapter will be distributed in the U.S. by Screen Gems in January 2017
